settings.testimonial: “My first time trying Goodrays and I wasn't disappointed. Delicious flavours and I felt so calm after”
settings.author: Phil

settings.testimonial: I have tried other Quanna products and have been really happy with them so I am giving this a go. I am just a week in, and already feeling results!
settings.author: Hanna

settings.testimonial: Effective gummies for every mood. The CBD gummies are really tasty and they work! The Nootropics work wonders however expect a very slight earthy matcha taste. I'm a convert!
settings.author: James

settings.testimonial: “ Love these CBD pouches! I started off using the Cool Mint and loved it! So I thought I'd try some new flavors. The peach is nice and my new fave is Rich Vanilla! I pop one in about 45 minutes before bed and it helps me relax and sleep better. Plus, they help with feeling better after a workout. The oils are good as well but you should give these a try!”
settings.author: Joe N.

settings.testimonial: “ Chill smokes are great and I'm so glad you can buy them in a carton of 10. It's really convenient. Delivery is quick and they really are a smooth smoke!”
settings.author: Dan O.

settings.testimonial: “ I've tried a lot of gummies and these are some of the best on the market. They taste great and always help me to feel a little more me and a litte more Chill”
settings.author: Chantelle

settings.testimonial:
“ As a non-smoker I was a little apprehensive to try, but I had read how smokes can be a good way to get the benefits of CBD. 

I’ve tried various CBD tinctures and CBD gummies without any noticeable benefits. The first night after smoking two, I scored my first ever excellent for sleep on my Fitbit! It could have been a coincidence but the second night I had a great sleep too! Will have to try the mint ones next!”
settings.author: Rich

settings.testimonial: “ Absolutely love these gummies! They taste amazing, they're vegan but mostly they really work. Really helps with my anxiety and love to take one before bed for a better nights sleep”
settings.author: Tom K.

settings.testimonial: “Really smooth and love the biodegradable filters”
settings.author: Chantelle

settings.text:
How to Relax

Your

Body?
settings.text_ordered_list:
• Spend time in nature
  • Get enough sleep
  • Go for a walk
  • Try yoga
  • Slow down and stretch

settings.text:
How to Calm

Your

Mind?
settings.text_ordered_list:
• Focus on your breathing
  • Talk about your problems
  • Listen to your favorite songs
  • Try meditation
  • Do more of what you love

settings.text:
Chill Check-In:

How to Practice Self-Care

settings.title:
Cool
Calm &
Carefree
settings.text:
Find peace with functional products 
made from all-natural ingredients.

settings.text_one: Organic Tapioca Syrup is what makes our gummies so special. It’s this natural, vegan-friendly binding agent that gives that signature chewy texture.
settings.text_two: This delicious and nutrient-rich tropical fruit is the sweet sensation that lends its fresh, juicy flavor to our vegan friendly CBD gummies.
settings.text_three: Our premium CBD isolate is sourced from natural hemp to provide all the benefits of cannabidiol with zero THC and no psychoactive effects.

settings.text_one: Our fragrant lavender burns smoothly and produces a sweet floral scent for a perfectly relaxing moment of aromatherapy.
settings.text_two: Native to the luscious valleys of North America, Lobelia is also known as Indian Tobacco and is sometimes used as an alternative to nicotine.
settings.text_three: Our premium CBD isolate is sourced from natural hemp to provide all the benefits of cannabidiol with zero THC and no psychoactive effects.

settings.text_one: This subtly sweet exotic fruit extract contains natural sugars and a unique antioxidant profile that elevates the delicious flavors of our chew pouches.
settings.text_two: Often known as coconut coir, this CBD-infused filler provides an unbeatable smooth flavor for a satisfying chew like no other.
settings.text_three: Our premium CBD isolate is sourced from natural hemp to provide all the benefits of cannabidiol with zero THC and no psychoactive effects.
